titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 230: Part of Ibn Gabirols' Keter malkut, paragraphs 1-2, 27-30

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

availability.licence: These images and the content of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 230: Part of Ibn Gabirols' Keter malkut, paragraphs 1-2, 27-30 are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Incipits in enlarged square characters above a space; second folio bears a catchword, as it is probably the exterior bifolium of the fascicle; Fol. 1, under the heading כתר מלכות bears the beginning of the hymn: בתפילתי יסכן גבר through paragraph 2, parallel to, in the published edition (Shire ha-ḳodesh le-Rabi Shelomoh ibn Gavirol / Dov Jarden [ed.]. Jerusalem : D. Yarden, 1986, vol. I, p. 39 l. 4.); Fol. 2 is from the 27th paragraph: פרי השכל והוא יתן to the 30th: [אם טהורה [תפיק, ibid. p. 55 l. 6-p. 57 l. 4. Variant readings.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library
